FuncDef: This command sets the yellow warning threshold for the differential delay for members within a multilink bundle. If circuit s delay exceeds the yellow-differential delay value, a log message and SNMP trap is sent. This command is only valid for MLPPP bundles. The differential delay is calculated as the round-trip differential delay for MLPPP bundles.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum yellow differential delay threshold value, in milliseconds. Values-1 to 25.
